It’s time to celebrate the reunion of the beloved UNIQLO x Marimekko limited-edition collection, enriching the humble pleasure of cozy dressing just in time for a joyful 2024 New Year. It offers head-to-toe warmth with UNIQLO’s winter signatures of soft fleeces and functional HEATTECH featuring Marimekko's world-renowned prints: Kivet (stones), Kissapöllö, and Seireeni by Maija Isola, along with Hattara by Pentti Rinta.

items.longDescription:
Sanrio characters

The Sanrio characters, especially Kuromi, who is popular for her devilish cuteness, have been gaining traction as fashion icons. This collection is sweet, spicy and easy to wear, incorporating elements of gothic and lolita fashion emblematic of Harajuku, the cultural center of Japan.

© 2023 SANRIO CO., LTD. APPROVAL NO. L643879

items.shortDescription: Beloved Cinnamoroll, Kuromi, and My Melody are now available in a gothic lolita style design with a sweet and spicy vibe.

- Made from 100% cashmere, the gem of fibers.

- This sweater is created using the WHOLEGARMENT®* method, which knits an entire garment at once for a comfortable fit that conforms to the body. *WHOLEGARMENTⓇ is a registered trademark of Shima Seiki Mfg., Ltd.
- The yarn thickness is matched to the WHOLEGARMENTⓇ machine to make a durable fabric.
- A special finish makes hand washing possible. *Since the shape of the garment may change when hung on a hanger, we recommend drying it flat after washing and folding it when storing.
- Updated underarms for improved stretch and ease of movement.
- Loose-fitting comfort with a streamlined look.
- The cuffs, hem, and neckline are made with a special threading technique to prevent stretching and create a durable construction.
